item.title: Damaged road surface causing house vibrations and internal house damage from traffic, 15th November
item.description:
Near the bus stop on Gloucester Road (near to house numbers 187 and 185 Gloucester Road), the road is in a very poor state of repair. Heavy traffic travelling along the road on the surface causes our house to seriously vibrate. We have had pictures and mirrors fall off walls, doors shake and damage internally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 211, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The water running down north road west is getting worse., 15th November
item.description:
The water running out of Aldi is getting worse. It is breaking up the tarmac. But more of an issue is when it gets cold next week and it freezes. It will be accidents waiting to happen as it is not a road that's gritted. With the road closed at the bamfurlong junction, north road west is being used more. PLEASE do something with this road. Please do not close without actually doing something.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, North Road West, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
